title: Bowie: the video collection
abstract: Space oddity (1972)--John I'm only dancing (1972)--Jean Genie (1972)--Life on Mars? (1973)--Be my wife (1977)--Heroes (1977)--Boys keep swinging (1979)--Look back in anger (1979)--DJ (1979)--Ashes to ashes (1980)--Fashion (1980)--Wild is the wind (1982)--Let's dance (1983)--China girl (1983)--Modern love (1983)--Blue jean (1984)--Loving the alien (1985)--Dancing in the street (1985)--Absolute beginners (1986)--Underground (1986)--As the world falls down (1986)--Day in day out (1987)--Time will crawl (1987)--Never let me down (1987)--Fame '90 (1990)
description: A wonderful collection of the innovative and ever-evolving music by British rock singer/composer, David Bowie, spanning part of his amazing career from 1972 through to 1990. Includes rare video clips and appearances by Peter Frampton, Alan Freeman, Mick Jagger and many other internationally known rock music performers. Digitally re-mastered.
